setupScript.name: moveFocusToFirstDisclosure
setupScript.description: sets focus on the first disclosure button
setupScript.source:
// sets focus on the first disclosure button
testPageDocument.querySelector('button[aria-controls="id_about_menu"]').focus();

user: With focus on the first disclosure button in the navigation region, set the state of the button to expanded.
instructions.raw: With focus on the first disclosure button in the navigation region, set the state of the button to expanded.
instructions.mode: Toggle Quick Nav OFF by pressing the Left Arrow and Right Arrow keys at the same time.

assertions.expectation: Change in state (to expanded) is conveyed
